sentence: The image is a webpage from Adobe's careers section, specifically focused on employee benefits in India.
sentence_cn: 该图是 Adob​​e 职业板块的一个网页，专门关注印度的员工福利。

sentence: It has a clean, professional layout with a sidebar on the right for job search and company information.
sentence_cn: 它具有简洁、专业的布局，右侧有侧边栏用于搜索职位和公司信息。

sentence: ### Main Content:
sentence_cn: ### 主要内容：

sentence: - Title: Benefits / India
sentence_cn: - 标题： 福利 / 印度

sentence: - Introduction: Adobe offers flexible, comprehensive benefits and compensation programs to support employees and their families.
sentence_cn: - 简介：Adobe 提供灵活、全面的福利和薪酬计划来支持员工及其家人。

sentence: #### Adobe & Wellness:
sentence_cn: #### Adob​​e 与健康：

sentence: - Healthcare: Medical insurance includes hospitalization, maternity, and coverage for spouse, up to 2 children, and dependent parents.
sentence_cn: - 医疗保健：医疗保险包括住院、生育以及配偶、最多 2 名子女和受抚养父母的保险。

sentence: Annual medical checkups are also provided.
sentence_cn: 还提供年度体检。

sentence: Additional wellness initiatives include on-site health seminars, wellness competitions, biometric screening, and healthy snacks.
sentence_cn: 其他健康计划包括现场健康研讨会、健康竞赛、生物特征筛查和健康零食。

sentence: - Time Off:
sentence_cn: - 休息时间：

sentence: - 10 local public holidays are observed.
sentence_cn: - 有10天当地公众假期。

sentence: - 15 days of paid time off per year.
sentence_cn: - 每年 15 天带薪休假。

sentence: - Sabbatical Leave is also available based on years of continuous service.
sentence_cn: - 根据连续服务年限，还可享受休假。

sentence: #### Adobe & Rewards:
sentence_cn: #### Adob​​e 与奖励：

sentence: - Focuses on financial planning and management for employees.
sentence_cn: - 专注于员工的财务规划和管理。

sentence: - Pay and Incentives: Competitive salaries and bonus programs for exemplary performance.
sentence_cn: - 薪酬和奖励：具有竞争力的薪酬和针对优秀表现的奖金计划。

sentence: ### Sidebar:
sentence_cn: ### 侧边栏：

sentence: - Quick Job Search: Options to select location and category with a search button.
sentence_cn: - 快速职位搜索：使用搜索按钮选择位置和类别的选项。

sentence: - Additional Information:
sentence_cn: - 附加信息：

sentence: - Link to join Adobe¡¯s award-winning team.
sentence_cn: - 链接加入 Adob​​e 屡获殊荣的团队。

sentence: - Advertisement for Adobe Life, a digital magazine available for download.
sentence_cn: - 可供下载的数字杂志 Adob​​e Life 的广告。

sentence: - Suggestion to view on Chrome or Firefox for the best web experience.
sentence_cn: - 建议使用 Chrome 或 Firefox 来浏览以获得最佳网络体验。

sentence: Visual elements include small images, a search section, and promotional banners for Adobe Life magazine.
sentence_cn: 视觉元素包括小图像、搜索部分和 Adob​​e Life 杂志的宣传横幅。
